name: searchcraft-javascript-sdks
description: The monorepo encompassing the SearchCraft SDKs.
author: Searchcraft

scripts.build:all: yarn build:core && yarn build:sdk-react && yarn build:sdk-javascript && yarn yalc:all
scripts.build:sdk-react: yarn build:core && yarn workspace @searchcraft/react-sdk build && yarn yalc:sdk-react
scripts.build:sdk-javascript: yarn build:core && yarn workspace @searchcraft/javascript-sdk build && yarn yalc:sdk-javascript
scripts.test:all: yarn test:core && yarn test:react-sdk && yarn test:javascript-sdk
scripts.yalc:all: yarn yalc:core && yarn yalc:sdk-react && yarn yalc:sdk-javascript
scripts.yalc:core: cd packages/core-sdk && yalc publish --private && yalc push --private
scripts.yalc:sdk-react: cd packages/react-sdk && yalc publish && yalc push
scripts.yalc:sdk-javascript: cd packages/javascript-sdk && yalc publish && yalc push
